text: Reece Mastin (born 24 November 1994) is an English-born Australian singer and songwriter. He won the third season of The X Factor Australia in 2011. Mastin then signed with Sony Music Australia. His first single, "Good Night", reached number one in Australia and New Zealand. The song also became Sony Music Australia's fastest selling digital single. Mastin's three studio albums are Reece Mastin, Beautiful Nightmare and Change Colours. Mastin was born in Scunthorpe, Lincolnshire. At the age of 11, he moved with his family to Greenwith, a suburb of Adelaide, South Australia. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Australian pop singers Category:Australian rock singers Category:Australian singer- songwriters Category:Naturalised citizens of Australia Category:People from Adelaide Category:People from Lincolnshire Category:The X Factor winners Category:Electropop singers
title: Reece Mastin
